snippet.title: Party Hard E3 2015 Trailer
snippet.description:
Party Hard is the tactical game of mass murder. You play as a regular guy who got fed up with neighbors having loud parties at 2am. One thing leads to another, and you find yourself at different parties with the goal to kill everyone in creative ways, and not get caught. 

At E3 2015 we are showing the feature-complete build of Party Hard. 

Play the demo at http://tinybuild.com/PartyHard
